relation: IMPORTANT: If you have a blog on JustBento...
pageTitle: Need basic bento gear? Think you are spending too much? I can help you. :) | Just Bento Community Forum
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {10519=If you check out this website from a fellow bento-er, I suppose you can get a small idea of what bento supplies are sold in san fran stores here: http://lunchinabox.net/2010/03/11/bento-store-update-san-francisco-japan...., 38780=And lastly a pink bento box ^_^ I was looking at the pictures from the blog you linked, and the boxes look pretty good, do you know roughly how much they cost? As long as it's pink i'll be happy, but i really like the look of these... http://www.daisojapan.com/p-10724-lunch-box-wseal-ring-10pks.aspx http://www.daisojapan.com/p-11153-strawberry-candy-lunch-box-wseal-ring-..., 34587=This coming weekend (Aug 28) I'm going to head to Japan town in SF to take a look and pictures of the bento stock. I think there is a Daiso there too, so if you can shoot me an email by then, I can pick up stuff while im there. :D It'll help pay for my train ticket x___x;;}
